subject: Re: [junit] test database behavior
msgSnippet: ... http://www.dallaway.com/acad/dbunit.html Read the article. It s a great place to start. Mike... is this a FAQ now? :) -- J. B. Rainsberger, Diaspar
messageBody:
Steven Woody wrote:

>
>
> 1) after a testcase done an insertion into the database, how do I test if
> or not the test success?
>
> 2) the first run of a testcase with insertion will success, but the
> following runs will fail caused by unique key violation. so, how
> should i write my testcases? do a deletion in every such testcase?

http://www.dallaway.com/acad/dbunit.html

Read the article. It's a great place to start.

Mike... is this a FAQ now? :)
--
J. B. Rainsberger,
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com :: +1 416 791-8603
Let's write software that people understand
